Sure, here's a mock dialogue of a pitch for the automatic UX evaluation tool:

Product Manager (PM): Good afternoon, thank you for taking the time to meet with us today. We are excited to introduce our product, an automatic UX evaluation tool designed specifically for the financial services industry. Our tool uses deep learning models to simulate a real person's behavior and preference based on CNN, attention maps, and other DL models.

Investor: Interesting, can you tell me more about the market potential for this product?

PM: Absolutely, the financial services industry is one of the fastest-growing sectors and has a huge demand for user-friendly and efficient digital channels. Our product can help financial institutions improve their digital channels' UX design by providing an accurate evaluation of user experience.

Investor: I see, what is your business model for this product?

PM: We plan to offer our product as a subscription-based service. Our clients will have access to our tool through a user-friendly dashboard where they can easily monitor and analyze their digital channels' UX performance.

Investor: How do you plan to reach your target market?

PM: We plan to use a multi-channel marketing approach, which includes online advertising, email marketing, and industry-specific events and conferences. We also plan to partner with industry influencers and publications to increase brand awareness.

Investor: What are your projections for revenue and growth?

PM: We anticipate that our product will generate $5 million in revenue within the first year, with a 20% growth rate each subsequent year.

Investor: Impressive. Can you tell me more about your team's qualifications?

PM: Our team consists of experienced product managers, software engineers, machine learning engineers, and UX researchers with a proven track record of success in their respective fields. We are confident that our team's expertise will enable us to deliver a high-quality product and excellent customer service.

Investor: Thank you for sharing that information. Can you provide me with more detailed financial projections and a demo of your product?

PM: Absolutely, we can schedule a follow-up meeting to go over those details and arrange a product demo for you. Thank you again for your time and consideration.
